manzils.text: Twa Seen Meem
Lawa ngamavesi encwadi ecacile
Siyazi ukuthi wena uphatheka kabi emphefumulweni ngenxa yokuthi abakholwa
Uma sithanda singehlisela phezu kwabo uphawu oluvela ezulwini oluzokwenza ukuthi kugobe izintamo zabo ngokuzithoba
Futhi angeke kufike kubona isikhumbuzo esisha esivela (kuMvelinqangi)onomusangaphandlekokubabayasifulathela
Ngakho-ke ngempela bayenqaba (incwadi) ziyofika kubona izindaba zalokho ababenza inhlekisa ngako
Ababheki yini emhlabeni ukuthi zingaki izinhlobo zezinto esenza ukuthi zimile kuwona na
Ngempela kulokho kunophawu futhi iningi labo aliyibona abakholwayo
Futhi ngempela iNkosi yakho yona iphakeme ngamandla inesihawu
Futhi (khumbula) ngenkathi iNkosi yakho ibiza uMose ukuthi akahambe aye kubantu abayizoni”
Abantu baFaro, ngakube abamesabi yini uMvelinqangi na
Wathi, “Nkosi yami ngempela mina ngiyesaba ukuthi bazongiphika.”
Futhi isifuba sami siyacinana nolimi lwami alukhulumi kahle ngakho-ke thumela ukuthi kulandwe u-Aroni
Futhi mina nginecala kubona, ngakho-ke ngiyesaba ukuthi bazongibulala
Wathi, “Qha hambani nobabili nezimpawu zethu ngempela thina sikanye nani, siyezwa”
Ngakho-ke hambani nobabili uma senifikile kuFaro nithi “thina siyizithunywa zeNkosi yemihlaba”
Ngakho-ke bavumele abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bahambe kanye nathi
(UFaro) wathi (kuMose), “asizange yini sikukhulise phakathi kwethu njengomntwana futhi wahlala kanye nathi iminyaka eminingi yempilo yakho na?”
Futhi wenza isenzo sakho owasenza kulapho wena wawungomunye wabangabongi
Wathi (uMose) “ngakwenza lokho ngenkathi mina ngangingomunye wabasephutheni”
Ngakho-ke ngabaleka kunina ngenkathi nginesaba kepha iNkosi yami yangipha isehlulelo futhi yangenza ngaba ngomunye wezithunywa
Futhi ngakube (iwona lowo) umusa ongikhumbuzisa wona ukuthi wagqilaza abantwana bakwa Israyeli na?”
UFaro (Wabuza) wathi “futhi iyini iNkosi yemihlaba na?”
(UMose waphendula) ngokuthi “iNkosi yamazulu nomhlaba kanye nakho konke okuphakathi kwako kokubili uma kungukuthi nifuna ukuqiniseka”
(UFaro) wathi “kulabo ababemzungezile “ngakube anikuzwa yini (lokho akushoyo) na?”
Wathi, “iNkosi yenu neNkosi yoyihlo basendulo”
(UFaro) wathi, “ngempela isithunywa senu lesi esithunywe kunina siyahlanya”
(UMose) wathi, “iNkosi yeMpumalanga neNtshonalanga kanye nakho konke okuphakathi kwako kokubili uma kungukuthi nina ninayo ingqondo”
(UFaro) wathi, “uma ukhetha omunye uNkulunkulu esikhundleni sami ngempela ngizokwenza ukuthi ube ngomunye weziboshwa”
UMose wathi, “yize noma ngingakulethela into esobala na?”
(UFaro) wathi, “ilethe uma wena ungomunye wabaneqiniso”
Ngakho-ke (uMose) waphonsa phansi induku yakhe kwaba yilapho iphenduka inyoka egqamile
Futhi wakhipha isandla sakhe kwaba yilapho simhlophe kwabasibonayo
(UFaro) wathi, ebaholini abamzungelezile ngempela lona ngumlumbi onolwazi olunzulu
Ufuna ukunigxosha ezweni lenu ngomlingo wakhe nicabanga ukuthi kwenziwe njani
Bathi, “mnike ithuba yena nomfowabo bese uthumela izigijimi emadolobheni”
Ukuze zikulethele bonke abalumbi abanolwazi olunzulu
Ngakho-ke abalumbi baqoqelwa ndawonye ukuze kuqokwe isikhathi ngosuku olwaziwayo
Futhi kwathiwa kubantu ngakube nina niyohlangana ndawonye na
Ukuze sibalandele abelumbi uma bona bengabanqobayo
Ngakho-ke kwathi lapho sebefika abalumbi bathi kuFaro, “ngakube sizowuthola yini umvuzo uma thina singabanqobayo na?”
UFarowathi,“yebofuthingempelaninanizobangabasondelayo (kumina)”
UMose wathi kubona, “phonsani lokho enizokuphonsa”
Ngakho-ke baziphonsa izintambo zabo kanye nezinduku zabo base bethi, “ngamandla kaFaro ngempela thina sizonqoba”
Ngakho-ke uMose wayiphonsa phansi induku yakhe kwaba yilapho – yona ikugwinya konke lokho okungamanga ababekuveza
Ngakho-ke bawa abelumbi bajabalala
Bathi, “sikholiwe eNkosini yemihlaba”
In kosi kaMose no-Aroni”

(UFaro) wathi, “senikholiwe kuyona ngaphambi kokuba ngininike imvume ngempela yena (uMose) iyiNkosi yenu okuyiyona eyanifundisa umlingo ngakho-ke nizokwazi, ngempela ngizonquma izandla zenu kanye nezinyawo zenu ezinhlangothini ezehlukene futhi ngempela ngizoninqamuleza nonke”
Bathi, “abukho ubungozi (asesabi lutho) ngempela thina siyophindela eNkosini yethu”
Siyethemba ukuthi iNkosi yethu izosithethelala ukona kwethu ngokuba singamakholwa okuqala”
Futhi sembula kuMose ukuthi akahambe ebusuku kanye nezinceku zami ngempela nina nizolandelwa
Ngakho-ke uFaro wathumela izigijimi emadolobheni
Ngempela laba bayiqembu elincane
Futhi ngempela bona bayasithukuthelisa
Futhi ngempela thina saqaphelisa wonke umphakathi
Ngakho-ke sabakhipha ezivandeni nasemithonjeni
Nasemicebweni	nakuzona	zonke	izinhlobo	zezindawo ezihloniphekile
Kanjalo sakunikeza lokho njengefa kubantwana bakwa- Israyeli
Ngakho-ke babalandela ngasekuphumeni kwelanga
Kwathi lapho amaqembu amabili esebonana abalandeli baMose bathi, “ngempela sesificiwe”
(UMose) wathi, “lutho! Ngempela iNkosi yami ikanye nami izongihola”
Ngakho-ke sembula kuMose ukuthi, “shaya ulwande ngenduku yakho” lwaqhekeka phakathi ingxenye nengxenye yaphenduka yaba yigquma elikhulu elinjengentaba
Futhi sabasondeza abanye lapho
Futhi samsindisa uMose kanye nababekanye naye bonke
Sabe sesiyabaminzisa abanye
Ngempela kulokho kunophawu futhi iningi labo alisibona abakholwayo
Futhi ngempela iNkosi yakho yona iphakeme ngamandla inesihawu
Futhi bafundele indaba ka-Abrahamu
Khumbula	ngenkathi	ethi	kuyise	nakubantu	bakhe, “nikhonzani na?”
Bathi, “sikhonza izithombe, sizinikele kuzona.”
(U-Abrahamu) wathi, “ngakube ziyanizwa yini uma nizibiza na?”
Noma ziwusizo kunina noma zinobungozi na
Bathi, “Qhabo! Safica obaba bethu benzenjalo (bezikhonza izithixo).”
U-Abrahamu wathi, “Ngakube nikubonile yini lokho nina enanikukhonza”
Nina kanye naboyihlo basendulo na
Ngakho-ke ngempela bona bayizitha kumina ngaphandle kweNkosi yemihlaba
Okuyiyona eyangidalayo, yona iyangihola
Futhi iyona engipha ukudla nengiphuzisayo
Futhi uma ngigula yona iyangelapha
Futhi iyona eyokwenza ukuthi ngife bese ingipha ukuphila
Futhi iyona engethemba ukuthi iyongithethelela amaphutha ami ngosuku lwenkokhelo
Nkosi yami ngiphe ukwehlulela (ukuhola okuyiqiniso) futhi ungihlanganise nabalungileyo
Futhi ngiphe udumo ezizukulwaneni ezilandelayo
Futhi	ngenze	ngibe	ngomunye	wezindlalifa	zesivande senjabulo
Futhi	thethelela	ubaba	ngempela	yena	ungomunye wabadukileyo
Futhi ungangiphathi kabi ngosuku lapho beyobe bevuswa
Ngosuku lapho umnotho nezingane kungeke kusize ngalutho
Ngaphandle	kwalowo	oyoza	kuMvelinqangi	nenhliziyo emsulwa
Futhi izulu liyosondezelwa abesaba uMvelinqangi
Futhi isihogo siyovezelwa obala labo abaphambukileyo
Futhi kuyothiwa kubona, “kuphi lokho enanikukhonza na?”
Esikhundleni sikaMvelinqangi na? Ngakube kuyanisiza noma kuyazisiza na
Ngakho-ke bayophonswa kusona (isihogo) bona kanye nabaphambukileyo
Kanye namabutho kasathane wonke
Lapho phakathi bona bayoxabana bathi
Sifunga ngoMvelinqangi! Ngempela sasisekudukeni okucacile
Ngenkathi sinilinganisa neNkosi yemihlaba
Futhi akekho owasidukisa ngaphandle kwezoni
Ngakho-ke asinaye ongomunye wabancengeli
Noma umngane omnene
Ngakho-ke ukube besingaphindela (emhlabeni) besizokuba ngabanye babakholwayo
Ngempela kulokho kunophawu futhi iningi labo alikholwa
Futhi ngempela iNkosi yakho yona iphakeme ngamandla inesihawu
Abantu baNowa baziphika izithunywa
Khumbula ngenkathi umfowabo uNowa ethi kubona, “animesabi yini na uMvelinqangi?”
Ngempela mina ngiyisithunywa esethembekile kunina
Ngakho-ke mesabeni uMvelinqangi futhi ningihloniphe
Futhi angiwuceli kunina umvuzo ngako, umvuzo wami angiwutholi (komunye umuntu) ngaphandle kokuwucela eNkosini yemihlaba
Ngakho-ke yesabani uMvelinqangi futhi ningihloniphe
Bathi, “singakholelwa yini kuwena kulapho ulandelwa ngabantu abasezingeni eliphansi kakhulu na?”
Wathi. “Futhi yiluphi ulwazi enginalo ngalokho ababekwenza na?”
Ukwahlulelwa kwabo kuseNkosini yami ukube nje benazi
Futhi angeke ngiwagxoshe amakholwa
Mina angiyilutho ngaphandle kokuba ngumxwayisi ocacile
Bathi, “uma ungaphezi Oh Nowa! Ngempela uzokuba ngomunye walabo abakhandwa ngamatshe”
(UNowa) wathi, “Nkosi yami ngempela abantu bami bangiphika.”
Ngakho-ke yehlulela phakathi kwami nabo futhi ungisindise kanye nanoma ngabe ngobani abakanye nami abangamakholwa
Ngakho-ke	samsindisa	kanye	nalabo	abakanye	naye emkhunjini othweleyo
Sabe sesibaminzisa abanye emva kwalokho
Ngempela kulokho kunophawu futhi iningi labo lalingesiwona amakholwa
Futhi ngempela iNkosi yakho yona iphakeme ngamandla inesihawu
Abantu base A’d baziphika izithunywa
Khumbula	ngenkathi	umfowabo	uHud	ethi	kubona “animesabi yini na uMvelinqangi?”
Ngempela mina ngiyisithunywa esethembekile kunina
Ngakho-ke yesabani uMvelinqangi futhi ningihloniphile
Futhi angiwufuni umvuzo kunina ngako, umvuzo wami angiwutholi komunye umuntu ngaphandle kokuwuthola eNkosini yemihlaba
Ngakube nenza uphawu phezu kwazo zonke izindawo eziphakeme? Niyazithokozisa
Futhi nizithathele izindlu ezinkulu ezidephile ezinohlonze ukuze nihlale kuzona ingunaphakade
Futhi uma nishaya, nishaya ngobudlova
Ngakho-ke yesabani uMvelinqangi futhi ningihloniphe
Futhi mesabeni lowo owanilekelela ngalokho enikwaziyo
Wanilekelela ngezinkomo nangezingane
Nangezivande nangemithombo
Ngempela mina ngiyanesabela isijeziso sosuku olukhulu
Bathi,	“kuyefana	kuthina	noma	uyashumayela	noma awusiyena omunye wabashumayelayo”
Lokhu	akuyilutho	ngaphandle	kokuba	kube	yinkolo yasendulo
Futhi thina angeke sijeziswe
Ngakho-ke bamphika sabe sesibabhubhisa, ngempela kulokho kunophawu futhi iningi labo lalingesiwona amakholwa
Futhi ngempela iNkosi yakho yona iphakeme ngamandla inesihawu
Abantu baThamud baziphika izithunywa
Khumbula ngenkathi umfowabo uSwalih ethi kubona “animesabi yini na uMvelinqangi.”
Ngempela mina ngiyisithunywa esethembekile kunina
Ngakho-ke yesabani uMvelinqangi futhi ningihloniphe
Futhi angiwufuni kunina umvuzo ngako, umvuzo wami awukho komunye umuntu ngaphandle kokuba useNkosini yemihlaba
Ngakube nizoyekwa niphephile kulokhu enikukona lapha
Ezivandeni nasemithonjeni
Nasemasimini nasezihlahleni zesundu isixha sazo sithambile
Futhi nimba izintaba ngobiciko ukuze nakhe izindlu
Ngakho-ke mesabeni uMvelinqangi futhi ningihloniphe
Futhi ningayihloniphi impoqo yezaphulamthetho
Labo abenza ukona ezweni, abangalungisi
Bathi, “kuphela wena ungomunye wabalunjiwe”
Awuyilutho ngaphandle kokuba ngumuntu onjengathi ngakho-ke makunjalo veza uphawu uma kungukuthi wena ungomunye wabaqinisile
Wathi, “leli yikameli lensikazi linelungelo lokuphuza, nani ninelungelo lokuphuza ngosuku olwaziwayo”
Futhi ningalithinti ngobubi hleze nithathwe yisijeziso sosuku olukhulu
Kepha balibulala (ikameli) base bephenduka abazisolayo
Ngakho-ke	bathathwa	yisijeziso,	ngempela	kulokho kunesifundo futhi iningi labo lalingeyibona abakholwayo
Futhi ngempela iNkosi yakho yona iphakeme ngamandla inesihawu
Abantu baLothi baziphika izithunywa
Khumbula	ngenkathi	umfowabo	uLothi	ethi	kubona “animesabi yini na uMvelinqangi?”
Ngempela mina ngiyisithunywa esethembekile kunina
Ngakho-ke mesabeni uMvelinqangi futhi ningihloniphe
Futhi angiwufuni kunina umvuzo ngako, umvuzo wami awukho komunye umuntu ngaphandle kokuthi useNkosini yemihlaba
Ngakube phakathi kwezidalwa (nikhetha) ukuya kwabesilisa na
Futhi niyeka labo iNkosi yenu eyanidalela bona ukuba babe ngamakhosikazi enu, Qhabo! Nina ningabantu abephula umthetho
Bathi, “Oh Lothi! uma ungaphezi ngempela uzokuba ngomunye wabagxoshiwe”
Wathi, “Ngempela mina lesisenzo senu angisithandi”
Nkosi yami ngisindise kanye nomndeni wami kulokhu abakwenzayo
Ngakho-ke samsindisa kanye nomndeni wakhe wonke
Ngaphandle konkosikazi omdala phakathi kwalabo ababesalele ngemumva
Sabe sesibabhubhisa abanye
Futhi sayinethisa imvula phezu kwabo, imvula eyayiyimbi kulabo ababexwayisiwe
Ngempelakulokhukunesifundofuthiiningilabolalingesiwona amakholwa
Futhi ngempela iNkosi yakho yona iphakeme ngamandla inesihawu
Izihlali zase-Aykah zaziziphika izithunywa
Khumbula ngenkathi uShuaib ethi kuzona “animesabi yini na uMvelinqangi?”
Ngempela mina ngiyisithunywa esethembekile kunina
Ngakho-ke mesabeni uMvelinqangi futhi ningihloniphe
Futhi angiwufuni kunina umvuzo ngako, umvuzo wami angiwutholi komunye umuntu ngaphandle kokuwuthola eNkosini yemihlaba
Nikezani isilinganiso esigcwele futhi ningabi ngabanye balabo abayimbangela yokulahleka
Futhi linganisani ngesikalo esiyiqiniso nesiqondile
Futhi ningayidli impahla yabantu ngamacebo ngokuyehlisa futhi ningenzi ukona emhlabeni
Futhi	mesabeni	lowo	owanidala	kanye	nezizukulwane zasendulo
Bathi, “kuphela wena ungomunye walabo abalunjiwe”
Futhi wena awuyilutho ngaphandle kokuba ngumuntu ofananathi futhi sicabanga ukuthi ungomunye wabaqamba amanga
Ngakho-ke makunjalo yehlisela phezu kwethu ingxenye yezulu uma kungukuthi ungomunye wabaqinisileyo
Wathi, “iNkosi yami eyazi kangcono ngaloko enikwenzayo”
Kepha bamphika, ngakho-ke yisijeziso sosuku lwethunzi, ngempela leso kwakuyisijeziso sosuku olukhulu
Ngempela	kulokho	kunesifundo	futhi	iningi	labo lalingeyiwona amakholwa
Futhi ngempela iNkosi yakho yona iphakeme ngamandla inesihawu
Futhi ngempela lesi yisambulo seNkosi yemihlaba
Esehliselwe	phansi	ngumoya	ongcwele	(uGabriyeli) owethembekile
Enhliziyweni yakho ukuze ube ngomunye wabaxwayisi
Ngolimi lwesi-Arabhu olucacile
Futhi ngempela yona (iQur’an) kwakubikezelwe ngayo emibhalweni yasemandulo
Akusilona yini uphawu kubona ukuthi izifundiswa zabantwana bakwa-Israyeli ziyayazi (iQur’an) na
Ngisho noma ngabe sasiyembule kwabanye bakwelinye izwe
Bese eyabafundela babengeke babe ngabakholelwa kuyona
Kanjalo sayenza ukuthi ingene igxile ezinhliziyweni zezoni
Abakholelwa kuyona kuze kube yilapho bebona khona isijeziso esibuhlungu
Ngakho-ke siyobafikela masinyane kulapho bona benganakile
Bayothi, “ngakube thina sizonikwa yini na ithuba?”
Ngakube basafuna yini ukusisheshisa isijeziso sethu na
Ngakube	ubonile	yini	ukuthi	sabathokozisa	iminyaka eminingi na
Kwabe sekufika kubona lokho ababethenjiswe kona na
Akuzange kubasize lokho ababezijabulisa ngako
Futhi alikho idolobha esalibhubhisa elalingenabo abexwayisi balo
Ngendlela	eyisikhumbuzo,	futhi	asikaze	senze okungenabulungiswa
Futhi akuyibona osathane abayiletha phansi(iQuran)
Futhi akubafanele (osathane ukwenza lokho) futhi abanawo amandla
Ngempela bona baqhelelanisiwe nokuzwa
Ngakho-ke	ungambizi	uMvelinqangi	kanye	nomunye uNkulunkulu ngokuba uzoba ngomunye wabajeziswayo
Futhi zixwayise izihlobo zakho ezisondele kakhulu
Futhi yiba mnene kunoma ngabe ngubani okulandelayo kwabakholwayo
Kepha uma bengakuhloniphi ngakho-ke ithi, “ngempela mina ngimsulwa kulokho enikwenzayo”
Futhi thembela kophakeme ngamandla onesihawu
Lowo okubonayo uma usukuma emthandazweni
Nokuhamba phakathi kwalabo abaguqile bezithobile
Ngempela yena ungozwayo, owaziyo
Ngakube nginitshelile yini ukuthi osathane behlela phezu kukabani na
Behlela phezu kwabona bonke abaqamba amanga abanezono
Bayamlalela (usathane) futhi iningi labo lingabaqambimanga
Kanye nezimbongi, abaphambukayo bayazilandela
Awuboni yini ukuthi bona bayazulazula kuzona zonke izigodi
Nokuthi bona basho lokho abangakwenzi

Ngaphandle kwalabo abakholwayo abenza izenzo ezilungileyo futhi abakhumbula uMvelinqangi kaningi futhi abavikelayo emva kokuba benziwe okungenabulungiswa futhi bayokwazi labo abenza okungenabo ubulungiswa ukuthi iyiphi indawo yokuphenduka abayophendukela kuyona
TA SEEN. Lawa ngamavesi eQur’an, futhi incwadi eyenza kucace
Eholayo nenikeza abakholwayo izindaba ezimnandi
Labo abenza umthandazo futhi abakhokha ingxenye yengcebo yabo kwabampofu kulapho bona beqinisekile ngempilo ezayo
Ngempela labo abangakholelwa empilweni ezayo sibenzele ukuthi imisebenzi yabo ibukeke imihle kubona ukuze bazulazule bephuphutheka
Labo-ke bayilabo okwabo okuyisijeziso esibi futhi bona empilweni ezayo bayoba ngabalahlekelwe kakhulu ukwedlula bonke
Futhi ngempela wena wenziwe ukuthi wemukela iQur’an konobuhlakani owaziyo
Khumbula ngenkathi uMose ethi emndenini wakhe, “ngempela mina ngibona umlilo ngizonilethela izindaba ezivela kuwona noma nginilethele amalahle ashisayo ukuze nizifudumeze”
Ngenkathi efika kuwona (umlilo) wamenyezwa kwathiwa “ubusisiwe noma ngabe ngubani osemlilweni nanoma ngabe ngubani owuzungelezile” futhi udumo malube kuMvelinqangi iNkosi yemihlaba
Oh Mose! Ngempela mina nginguMvelinqangi ophakeme ngamandla onobuhlakani
Futhi phonsa phansi induku yakho, ngakho-ke kwathi lapho eyibona inyakaza sengathi inyoka waphenduka wabaleka wangabheki	emumva,	“Oh	Mose!	Ungesabi	ngempela azingesabi izithunywa ezikanye nami”
Ngaphandle kwalowo owenza okungenabulungiswa bese eshintsha okuhle emva kokubi, ngakho-ke ngempela mina ngingothethelelayo onesihawu

Futhi faka isandla sakho ephaketheni lakho sizophuma simhlophe singenabubi (lezi ngezinye) zezimpawu eziyisishiyagalolunye oyoziyisa kuFaro nabantu bakhe, ngempela bona bangabantu abangalungile abayizoni
Ngakho-ke kwathi lapho sezifika kubona izimpawu zethu ezibonakalayo bathi, “lona ngumlingo ocacile”
Futhi baziphika (lezo zimpawu) ngokungemthetho nangokuqhosha kulapho imiphefumulo yabo yenelisekile, ngakho-ke bheka ukuthi sasinjani isiphetho sezoni
Futhi ngempela samnikeza ulwazi uDavide noSolomoni bobabili base bathi, “Udumo malube kuMvelinqangi okunguyena owasikhetha ngaphezu kwezinceku zakhe eziningi ezingamakholwa”
USolomoni wadla ifa (ubuphrofethi) kuDavide wayesethi, “Oh Bantu! Sifundiswe ulimi lwezinyoni futhi siphiwe kuzona zonke izinto, ngempela lobu ngububele obugqamile”
Futhi kwaqoqelwa ndawonye kuSolomoni amabutho akhe angamaJinn nabantu kanye nezinyoni wonke ayemiswe ngendlela yempi (belungele ukuhamba)
Kwaze kwaba yilapho befinyelela khona esigodini sezintuthwane enye yezintuthwane yathi, “Oh Zintuthwane! ngenani ezindlini zenu hleze uSolomoni namabutho akhe anifihlize kulapho bona bengaboni”

Ngakho-ke (uSolomoni) wamomotheka ehleka inkulumo yayo wayesethi, “Nkosi yami ngenze ukuthi ngibonge ububele bakho owangenzela bona kanye nabazali bami futhi ngenze umsebenzi olungileyo owuthokozelayo futhi ngingenise ngomusa wakho phakathi kwezinceku zakho ezilungileyo”
Futhi wazihlola izinyoni wayesethi, “kwenziwa yini ukuthi ngingamboni uHud Hud noma ungomunye walabo abangekho na?”
Ngempela ngizomjezisa ngesijeziso esinzima noma ngempela ngimbulale ngaphandle uma engitshela isizathu esicacile
Akazange ahlale isikhathi eside wayesethi, “ngithole lokho ongazange ukuthole futhi ngikulethele izindaba eziyiqiniso ezivela kuSaba”
Ngempela mina ngifice owesifazane ebabusa futhi uphiwe kuzona zonke izinto futhi unesihlalo sobukhosi esikhulu

Ngimfumane ekanye nabantu bakhe bekhonza ilanga esikhundleni sikaMvelinqangi futhi uSathane wabenzela yabukeka imihle imisebenzi yabo kubona wayesebavimbela endleleni (eqondile) ngakho-ke bona abaholekanga
Abamkhonzi uMvelinqangi okunguyena oveza okufihlekile emazulwini nasemhlabeni futhi owazi konke lokho enikufihlayo nakho konke lokho enikuvezayo
UMvelinqangi akekho omunye uMvelinqangi ngaphandle kwakhe uyiNkosi yesihlalo sobukhosi esikhulu
Wathi, “sizobona ukuthi ukhuluma iqiniso noma ungomunye walabo abaqamba amanga”
Hamba nalencwadi yami bese uyijikijela kubona bese uyabafulathela bese uyabheka ukuthi yini abayibuyisayo
Owesifazane wathi, “Oh Baphathi! Ngempela kujikijelwe kumina incwadi engcwele”
Ngempela yona ivela kuSolomoni futhi ngempela yona ingegama likaMvelinqangi onomusa onesihawu
Ningaziphakamisi kumina futhi yizani kumina ngokuzinikela
Wathi owesifazane, “Oh Baphathi! ngelulekeni odabeni lwami, angeke ngikhiphe isinqumo odabeni kuze kube yilapho nikhona kanye nami.”
Bathi, “thina singabanamandla amakhulu futhi singabanempi enkulu, impoqo ingeyakho, ngakho-ke cabanga ukuthi uzophoqa ukuba kwenziweni”
Yathi indlovukazi, “ngempela amakhosi uma engena edolobheni enza ukona kulona bese enza abantu balo abahloniphekile ukuthi babesezingeni eliphansi futhi enza kanjalo”
Futhi ngempela mina ngizothumela kubona isipho bese ngibheka ukuthi yini izithunywa ezizobuya nayo

Ngakho-ke kwathi lapho sezifika (izithunywa) kuSolomoni nesipho wathi “ngakube ningelekelela ngengcebo na? Lokho uMvelinqangi angipha kona kungcono kunalokho anipha kona kepha nina nithokozile ngesipho senu”
Phindelani kubona ngempela thina sizoza kubona namabutho empi abangeke bakwazi ukuwavimba futhi ngempela sizobakhipha lapho ngechilo, futhi bayobe bethotshisiwe”
Wathi, “Oh Baphathi! Ngubani phakathi kwenu ozongilethela isihlalo sobukhosi sakhe owesifazane ngaphambi kokuba bafike kumina bezinikele ngokuzithoba”
Elinye lamaJinn lathi, “Mina ngizosiletha kuwena ngaphambi kokuba usukume endaweni yakho futhi ngempela mina nginamandla ngethembekile”

Lowo onolwazi lencwadi wathi, “ngizosiletha kuwena ngaphambi kokuphazima kweso lakho” Mina ngizosiletha kuwena ngaphambi kokuphazima kweso lakho” ngakho- ke kwathi lapho esibona sibekwe eduzane naye wathi “lokhu kungomusa weNkosi yami ukuze ingivivinye ukuthi ngiyabonga noma angibongi futhi noma ngabe ngubani obongayo kuphela ubongela umphefumulo wakhe f u t h i noma ngabe ngubani ongabongi ngakho-ke ngempela iNkosi yami ayidingi lutho ihloniphekile”
Wathi, “sisithezeleni owesifazane isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi (ukuze angasiboni ukuthi yisona noma akusiyona) ukuze sibone ukuthi owesifazane ungoholiweyo noma ungomunye walabo abangaholiwe”

Ngakho-ke kwathi lapho esefika owesifazane kwathiwa “ngakube sinjena yini na isihlalo sakho sobukhosi?” Owesifazane wathi,“ungathi yisona” (uSolomoni wathi) “futhi sinikeziwe ulwazi ngaphambilini kwakhe owesifazane futhi sasizinikele ngaphansi kwentando kaMvelinqangi”
Futhi kwamvimba lokho ayekukhonza esikhundleni sikaMvelinqangi ngempela yena owesifazane wayengomunye walabobantu abangakholwa

Kwathiwa kuyena owesifazane, “ngena endlini yobukhosi edephile” kwathi lapho owesifazane eseyibona wacabanga ukuthi indawo yayo yaphansi yakhiwe ngamanzi (noma kunedamu lamanzi ngaphansi kwendlu enkulu yobukhosi waphakamisa izingubo zakhe) kwavela imilenze yakhe (uSolomoni) wathi “ngempela yindlu yobukhosi eyenziwe ngengilazi” owesifazane wathi “Nkosi yami ngempela mina ngenze okungalungile emphefumulweni wami futhi ngiyazinikela kanye noSolomoni kuMvelinqangi iNkosi yemihlaba”
Futhi ngempela sathumela kuThamud umfowabo uSalih ukuthi khonzani uMvelinqangi kulapho bona bengamaqembu amabili angaboni ngasolinye
Wathi, “Oh Bantu bami! kungani nijaha ebubini ngaphambi kokuhle na? Aniyiceli ngani intethelelo kaMvelinqangi ukuze mhlawumbe ninikwe umusa na?”
Bathi, “sihlahla umhlola kuwena kanye nalabo abakanye nawe” wathi, “umhlola wenu ukuMvelinqangi kepha nina ningabantu abavivinywayo”
Futhi edolobheni kwakukhona abantu abayisishiyagalolunye ababenza ukona ezweni futhi bangalungisi

Bathi, “makafunge omunye komunye ngoMvelinqangi ukuthi ngempela sizomhlasela ebusuku kanye nomndeni wakhe bese ngempela sithi esihlotsheni sakhe “asikubonanga okubhubhise abantu bakhe futhi ngempela thina sikhuluma iqiniso”
Futhi benza icebo nathi senza icebo kulapho bona bengaboni
Ngakho-ke bheka ukuthi sasinjani isiphetho secebo labo, ngempela sababhubhisa kanye nabantu babo ndawonye
Ngakho-ke lezozindlu zabo zadilika ngenxa yokuthi babonile ngempela kulokho kunophawu (nesifundo) kubantu abaziyo
Futhi sabasindisa labo ababekholwa futhi ababemesaba uMvelinqangi
Kanye noLothi khumbula ngenkathi ethi kubantu bakhe, “ngakube nenza izenzo ezingalungile kulapho nina nibona na?”
Ngakube ngempela nina nikhanukela amadoda esikhundleni sabesifazane na? Qhabo! Nina ningabantu abangenalo ulwazi
Ayibanga yilutho impendulo yabantu bakhe ngaphandle kokuthi bathi “asiwukhipheni umndeni kaLothi edolobheni lenu ngempela bona bayibantu abahlanzekile abamsulwa”
Ngakho-ke samsindisa kanye nomdeni wakhe ngaphandle konkosikazi wakhe samenza ukuba abe ngomunye wabasalela ngemumva
Futhi sayinethisa phezu kwabo imvula kangangoba kwakuyimvula embi yalabo ababexwayisiwe
Ithi, “udumo lungolukaMvelinqangi futhi ukuthula makube ezincekwini zakhe lezo azikhetha, ngakuba uMvelinqangi ungcono noma yilokho abamenzela ngakho abahlanganyeli ekumkhonzeni na?”

Ubani owadala amazulu nomhlaba futhi wanehlisela phansi amanzi avela esibhakabhakeni sabe sesikhulisa ngayo izivande ezinhle ezijabulile? Angeke nibe nawo amandla okukhulisa izihlahla zawo, ngakube ukhona yini unkulunkulu okanye noMvelinqangi na? Kepha bona bangabantu abenza abalingani

Akusiyena yini owenza umhlaba waba yindawo yokuhlala wayesebeka imifula kuwona futhi wabeka izintaba kuwona futhi wabeka isehlukaniso phakathi kwezilwandle ezimbili, ngakube ukhona yini unkulunkulu okanye noMvelinqangi na? Kepha iningi labo alazi

Ubani ophendula lowo ophelelwe yithemba uma emmemeza futhi asuse okubi bese enenza nibe yisizukulwane esilandelayo emhlabeni na? Ngakube ukhona yini unkululnkulu okanye noMvelinqangi na? Kuncane enikukhumbulayo

Ubani oniholayo ebumnyameni bezwe nolwandle futhi othumela imimoya njengezindaba ezimnandi ngaphambi komusa wakhe na? Uphakeme uMvelinqangi ngaphezu kwalokho abamenzela ngako abahlanganyeli ekumkhonzeni

Ubani osungula indalo bese eyiphinda futhi anabele ngokuvela ezulwini nasemhlabeni ngakube ukhona yini unkulunkulu okanye noMvelinqangi na? Ithi “lethani ubufakazi benu uma kungukuthi nina nineqiniso”
Ithi, “akekho ngisho noyedwa osemazulwini nasemhlabeni owazi okungabonwayo ngaphandle kukaMvelinqangi futhi abazi ukuthi bayovuswa nini kwabafileyo”
Qhabo! abanalo ulwazi ngempilo ezayo qhabo bona basekungabazeni ngayo Kepha bona bayizimpumputhe ngayo
Futhi labo abangakholwanga bathi ngakube uma sesiwuthuli kanye nobaba bethu ngempela siyovezwa (sibe yizidalwa ezintsha yini na)
Ngempela sathenjiswa lokhu thina kanye nabobaba bethu ngaphambilini lokhu akuyilutho ngaphandle kokuthi kuyizinganekwane zabantu basendulo
Ithi hambani ezweni bese niyabona ukuthi sabayini isiphetho sezoni
Futhi ungaphatheki kabi ngabo futhi ungabi lusizi ngalokho abenza ngako icebo
Futhi bathi, “siyogcwaliseka nini lesisithembiso uma kungukuthi nina nineqeniso na?”
Ithi, “mhlawumbe kuseduzane emumva kwenu okunye kwalokho enifuna ukuba kusheshe”
Futhi ngempela iNkosi yakho ingumnikazi womusa ebantwini kepha iningi labo alibongi
Futhi ngempela iNkosi yakho iyakwazi lokho izifuba zabo ezikufihlayo kanye nalokho ezikuvezayo
Futhi akukho lutho olufihlekile ezulwini nasemhlabeni ngaphandle kokuthi kusencwadini ecacile
Ngempela leQur’an izekela abantwana bakwa-Israyeli labo abaningi babo abaphikisanayo ngako
Futhi ngempela ukuholwa nomusa kungokwabakholwayo
Ngempela iNkosi yakho iyokwehlulela phakathi kwabo ngesehlulelo sayo futhi yona iphakeme ngamandla inolwazi
Ngakho-ke yethembela kuMvelinqangi ngempela wena useqinisweni eligqamile
Ngempela wena angeke wenze abafile ukuthi bezwe futhi angeke wenze izithuli ukuba zizwe ukumenyezwa uma sezifulathele zibaleka
Futhi wena angeke uzihole izimpumputhe ekudukeni kwazo, ungenza ukuthi bezwe labo abakholelwa emavesini ethu ngakho-ke labo bangabazinikele ngaphansi kwentando kaMvelinqangi
Futhi uma behlelwa yizwi sizobavezela isidalwa esinyakazayo esiphuma emhlabeni ukuthi sikhulume nabo ngoba abantu abazange baqiniseke ngamavesi ethu
Futhi ngosuku lapho siyoqoqa kuleso nalesosizwe iqembu phakathi kwalabo ababephika amavesi ethu bese beyiswa (endaweni yokwahlulelwa)
Kuzekuthi uma befika athi ngakube naniwaphika yini amavesi ami kulapho naningenalo ulwazi ngawo, kwakuyini lena enayiyenza na
Futhi izwi liyogcwaliseka kubona ngenxa yokuthi bebenza okungenabo ubulungiswa ngakho-ke bona angeke bakhulume
Ababoni yini ukuthi sabenza ubusuku ukuthi baphumule kubona nemini ukuze ibanike ukukhanya na? ngempela kulokho kunezimpawu kubantu abakholwayo

Futhi ngosuku lapho kuyobe kushawa ngalo icilongo, noma ngabe ngubani osemazulwini noma ngabe ngubani osemhlabeni uyokwesaba ngaphandle kwalabo ngokuthanda kukaMvelinqangi, futhi bonke bayoza kuyena bezithobile

Futhi uyobona izintaba ucabange ukuthi zisimeme kulapho zona ziyobe zidlula njengokudlula kwamafu, okwenziwe nguMvelinqangi okunguyena owenzisisa kahle zonke izinto, ngempela yena unolwazi olunzulu ngalokho enikwenzayo
Noma ngabe ngubani ofike nokuhle ngakho-ke okwakhe okungcono kunako futhi bona bayophepha ekwesabeni kwangalolosuku
Futhi noma ngabe ngubani oyofika nokubi buyophonswa emlilweni ubuso babo, ngakube niyonikezwa omunye umvuzo ngaphandle kwalokho enanikwenza na
Kuphela ngiphoqiwe ukuba ngikhonze iNkosi yalelidolobha (Makkag) elenze labangcwele futhi kungokwakhe, futhi ngiphoqiwe ukuthi ngibe ngomunye wabazinikele ngaphansi kwentando kaMvelinqangi

Futhi (ngiphoqiwe) ukuba ngifunde iQur’an ngakho-ke noma ngabe ngubani oholiwe kuphela uholelwe umphefumulo wakhe futhi noma ngabe ngubani odukayo ngakho-ke ithi, “kuphela mina ngingomunye wabaxwayisi”
Futhi ithi, “Udumo lungolukaMvelinqangi uzonikhombisa amavesi akhe ukuze niwazi futhi akusikona ukuthi iNkosi yakho ayikunakile lokho enikwenzayo”
Twa Seen Meem
Lawa ngamavesi encwadi ecacile
Siwafundela wena ngeqinso ezindabeni zikaMose kanye noFaro, ebantwini abakholwayo

Ngempela uFaro waziphakamisa emhlabeni wenza abantu bawo amaqembu ecindezela iqembu (labantwana baka-Israel) phakathi kwabo ebulala amadodana abo eshiya abesifazane babo bephila, ngempela yena wayengomunye wabacindezeli
Futhi sasifuna ukubeka umusa phezu kwalabo ababenziwe baba buthakathaka emhlabeni, futhi sibenze babengabaholi futhi sibenze izindlalifa
Futhi sibazinzise emhlabeni futhi sikhombize ufaro, Haman kanye namabuthoabo bobabili avela phakathi kwabo lokho abakwesabayo

Futhi sakwembula kunina kaMose ukuthi amncelise uma unokwesaba ngaye ngakho-ke mphonse emfuleni, ungesabi futhi ungaphatheki kabi ngempela thina sizomphindise la kuwena futhi sizomenza omunye wezithunywa
Ngakho-ke abantu baFaro bamthatha ukuze abeyisitha nosizi kubona, ngempela uFaro noHaman kanye namabutho abo bobabili babeyizoni
Futhi unkosikazi kaFaro wathi, “ungumduduzi wehlo lami nehlo lakho ungambulali angase abewusizo kuthina noma simthathe njengendodana” lapho bengazi
Futhi inhliziyo kanina kaMose yaba igobongo, wacishe wamveza ukube sasingayiqinisanga inhliziyo yakhe ukuze ahlale engomunye wabakholwayo
Futhi owesifazane (unina ka-Mose) wathi kudadewabo wesilisa “mlandele owesilisa” owesifazane (udade wabo) wayesembheka owesilisa ebuqamama kulapho bona bengaboni
Futhi ngaphambilini samuqabela ukuthi angancela kwabanye abancelisi bese udade wabo wayesithi, “nginganikhombisa yini abantu bomndeni abazonikhulisela yena futhi abazomeluleka na?”
Ngakho-ke samphindisela kunina ukuze amehlo akhe aduduzeke futhi angabi lusizi nokuthi azi ukuthi isethembiso sika Mvelinqangi siyiqiniso kepha iningi labo alazi
Futhi kwathi lapho esekhulile ngokuphelele samupha ubuhlakani nolwazi, sibapha kanjalo umvuzo abenza okuhle

Futhi (uMose) wangena edolobheni ngenkathi abantu balo benganakile wafica khona amadoda amaibili elwa omunye engoweqembu lakhe futhi omunye (engoweqembu) lezitha zakhe, ngakho-ke lowo ongoweqembu lakhe wacela usizo kuyena ukuze abhekane nesitha sakhe, ngakho-ke uMose wamshaya ngesibhakela wambulala wathi “lokhu kungomunye womsebenzi kasathane, ngempela yena uyisitha esicacile esidukisayo
Wathi, “Nkosi yami ngempela mina ngiwonile umphefumulo wami ngakho-ke ngithethelele” yamthethelela ngempela yona iyathethelela inesihawu
Wathi, “Nkosi yami, ngenxa yobubele ongenzele bona ngakho-ke angisoze ngaba ngumsizi wezoni”
Ngakho-ke waphenduka owesabayo edolobheni ebheka emaceleni, kulapho lowo owayecele kuyena usizo ngayizolo ecela usizo kuyena uMose wathi kuyena “ngempela wena uhlale unochuku olugqamile”

Ngakho-ke kwathi lapho efuna ukumbamba lowo oyisitha sabo bobabili wathi, “Oh Mose! Ngakube ufuna ukungibulala njengoba ubulale umuntu izolo na? awufuni lutho ngaphandle kokuba yisidlova ezweni futhi awufuni ukuba ngomunye wabalungileyo”
Futhi kweza umuntu egijima eqhamuka endaweni eqhelelene kakhulu nedolobha wathi, “Oh Mose! Ngempela abaholi babopha uzungu ngawe ukuthi bakubulale ngakho-ke hamba ngempela mina ngingomunye wabeluleki
Ngakho-kewemukakulona(idolobha) esaba, ejeqezaemaceleni wathi “Nkosi yami ngisindise ebantwini abangalungile”
Futhi kwathi lapho elibhekise eMadyan wathi, “Ngifisa ukuthi iNkosi yami ingiholele endleleni eqondile”

Futhi kwathi lapho esefika emanzini aseMadyan wafica isixuku sabantu siphuzisa (imfuyo) amanzi futhi ngaphandle kwaso (isixuku sabantu) wafica abesifazane ababili ababemise (imihlambiyaboukubaingaphuziuMose) wathi,“kwenzenjani ngani nobabili” bobabili bathi, “angeke siyiphuzise (imihlambi yethu amanzi) kuze kube abelusi basusa (imihlambi yabo) futhi ubaba wethu usekhule kakhulu”
Ngakho-ke wabaphuzisela bobabili (imihlambi yabo) wayesephenduka eya emthunzini wayesethi, “Nkosi yami ngempela mina nginesidingo sanoma ngabe yini enhle oyehlisele phezu kwami”

Ngakho-ke oyedwa wabesifazane ababili weza kuyena ehamba ekhophoza wathi owesifazane, “ngempela ubaba wami uyakumema ukuze akunike umvuzo ngokusiphuzisela kwakho (imihlambi) ngakho-ke kwathi lapho esefika kuyena wamxoxela indaba wathi ungesabi uphephile ebantwini abangalungile
Owesifazane oyedwa kubona bobabili wathi, “Oh baba wami! Mqashe ngempela ungumuntu ongcono kakhulu ukuba umqashe unamandla, wethembekile”

Wathi (uyise wabesifazane ababili) “ngempela mina ngithanda ukuba ushade neyodwa yamadodakazi ami amabili ngesivumelwano sokuba ungisebenzele iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili kepha uma uqeda eyishumi kuyobe kungentando yakho futhi angithandi ukukubeka ebunzimeni uzongifumana ngingomunye wabalungileyo uma uMvelinqangi ethanda
Wathi lokho kuphakathi kwami nawe noma ngabe yikuphi kwako kokubili engiyokufeza angeke kubekhona okungenabo ubulungiswa kumina futhi uMvelinqangi ungaphezu kwalokho esikushoyo

Ngakho-ke kwathi lapho uMose esesiqedile isikhathi esimisiwe futhi esehamba nomndeni wakhe wabona umlilo eceleni kweTur wathi emndenini wakhe, “yimani ngempela mina ngibone umlilo ngingeza kunina nezindaba ezivela kuwona noma isikhuni somlilo ukuze nizifudumeze”
Ngakho-ke kwathi lapho esefika kuwona wamenyezwa eceleni langakwe sokudla lesogodi endaweni ebusisiwe esihlahleni Oh Mose! Ngempela mina nginguMvelinqangi iNkosi yemihlaba

Futhi phonsa induku yakho phansi, ngakho-ke kwathi lapho eseyibona inyakaza sengathi iyinyoka waphenduka wabaleka wangabe esabheka emumva Oh Mose! Sondela ungesabi ngempela wena ungomunye wabaphephile

Faka isandla sakho ephaketheni lakho sizophuma simhlophe singenabo ububi futhi sondeza isandla sakho kuwena ukuze uqede ukwesaba lezi yizimpawu ezimbili ezivela eNkosini yakho ziya kuFaro nabaholi bakhe ngempela bona bangabantu abangahloniphi
Wathi (uMose), “Nkosi yami ngempela mina ngabulala umuntu kubona ngakho-ke ngiyesaba ukuthi bazongibulala
Kodwa umfowethu u-Aroni yena ukhuluma kangcono kunami ngakho-ke mthumele kanye nami njengomsizi angiqinise ngempela mina ngiyesaba ukuthi bazongiphika

Wathi, “sizoqinisa ingalo yakho ngomfowenu futhi nobabili sizoninikeza igunya lokuthi bangafinyeleli kunina nobabili ngezimpawu zethu, nina nobabili kanye nanoma ngabe ngubani onilandelayo nobabili niyoba ngabanqobi”
Ngakho-ke kwathi lapho uMose esefika kubona nezimpawu zethu ezicacile bathi, “lokhu akuyilutho ngaphandle kokuba ngumlingo owenziwe futhi asikaze sizwe ngalokhu kobaba bethu basendulo”
Futhi uMose wathi, “iNkosi yami yazi kangcono ngalowo owafika nokuhola okuvela kuyona kanye nalowo oyoba nesiphetho esihle empilweni ezayo, ngempela yona ayiziphumelelisi izoni”

Futhi uFaro wathi “Oh baholi! Angazi ukuthi ninaye unkulunkulu ngaphandle kwami ngakho-ke ngibasele (umlilo) we Haman (ukuze wenze izitini) ngobumba bese ungenzela indlu ephakeme ukuze ngigibele ngibone uNkulunkulu kaMose futhi ngempela mina ngicabanga ukuthi yena ungomunye wabaqamba amanga
Futhi wayeqhosha yena namabutho akhe ezweni ngokungesilona iqiniso futhi babecabanga ukuthi angeke babuyiselwe kuthina
Ngakho-ke samthatha kanye namabutho akhe sabaphonsa olwandle ngakho-ke bheka ukuthi sasinjani isiphetho sezoni
Futhi sabenza ukuthi babengabaholi abamemela emlilweni futhi ngosuku lokuvuka kwabafileyo angeke balekelelwe
Futhi sabalandelanisa ngesiqalekiso kulomhlaba futhi ngosuku lokuvuka kwabafileyo bona bayokuba ngabanye babavinjelwe emseni kaMvelinqangi
Futhi ngempela samnikeza uMose incwadi emva kokuba sesibhubhise izinkulungwane zasemandulo, ukukhanyiselwa kwabantu nokuholwa kanye nomusa ukuze mhlawumbe bakhumbule
Futhi wawungekho ngaseduzane nentshonalanga ngenkathi senza impoqo kuMose futhi wawungesiyena omunye wofakazi
Kepha saziveza izizukulwane sazelulela izikhathi zempilo yazo futhi wawungahlali nabantu baseMidyani ubafundele amavesi ethu kepha yithina esingabathumeli (baleyomyalezo)
Futhi wawungekho eduzane nentaba ngenkathi sasimemeza, kepha ngumusa ovela eNkosini yakho ukuze uxwayise abantu okungazange kufike kubona umxwayisi ngaphambilini kwakho ukuze bakhumbule

Futhi uma bengase behlelwe okubi ngenxa yalokho okuthunyelwe yizandla zabo ngaphambili bathi, “Nkosi yethu kungani ungasithumelanga kuthina isithunywa ukuze silandele amavesi akho bese siba ngabanye babakholwayo na

Ngakho-ke kwathi lapho sebefikelwa yiqiniso elivela kuthina bathi, “kungani enganikezwanga (izimpawu) ezifana nalezo ezanikezwa uMose na? Ngakube abakholelwa yini kulokho okwanikezwa uMose ngaphambilini” bathi “imilingo emibili omunye welekelela omunye futhi bathi ngempela asikholelwa kukona kokubili”
Ithi “ngakho-ke lethani incwadi evela kuMvelinqangi okuyiyona ehola kangcono kunalezi zombili engizoyilanda uma kungukuthi nina nineqiniso

Kepha uma bengakuphenduli ngakho-ke yazi ukuthi kuphela balandela izinkanuko zabo futhi ngubani ophambuke kakhulu kunalowo olandela izinkanuko zakhe ngaphandle kokuholwa okuvela kuMvelinqangi ngempela uMvelinqangi akabaholi abantu abayizoni
Futhi ngempela sabathumelela izwi ukuze bakhumbule
Labo esabanikeza incwadi ngaphambilini kwayo, bona bakholelwa kuyona
Futhi uma befundelwa yona bathi “siyakholelwa kuyona ngempela yona iyiqiniso elivela eNkosini yethu ngempela thina ngaphambilini kwayo, sasingabazinikeleyo ngaphansi kwentando kaMvelinqangi
Labo bayonikezwa umvuzo wabo amahlandla amabili ngenxa yokuthi babebekezela besusa okubi ngokuhle futhi bayephana ngaloko esababela kona
Futhi uma bezwa inkulumo embi bayaqhelelana nayo futhi bathi, “okwethu yimisebenzi yethu nokwenu yimisebenzi yenu, ukuthula makube kunina asibathandi abangazi lutho
Ngempela wena awumholi lowo omthandayo kepha nguMvelinqangi ohola lowo amthandayo futhi yena wazi kangcono ngabaholiweyo

Futhi bathi, “uma silandela ukuholwa kanye nawe sizosuswa ezweni lethu” asizange yini sibabekele indawo engcwele ephephile ekulethwa kuyona izithelo eziyizinhlobonhlobo okuyisabelo esivela kuthina kepha iningi labo alazi

Futhi mangaki amadolobha esawabhubhisa ayengazibongi izindlela zawo zokuphila na? Ngakho-ke lezo yizindawo zabo zokuhlala ekungazange kuhlalwe kuzona ngemva kwabo ngaphandle kwesikhashana futhi thina sasiyizindlalifa

Futhi iNkosi yakho ayizange iwabhubhise amadolobha kuze kube yilapho ithumela isithunywa kumama wedolobha sibafundela amavesi ethu futhi sasingawabhubhisi amadolobha ngaphandle kokuba uma abantu bawo bonile
Futhi noma ngabe yini enanikezwa yona yinjabulo yempilo yakulomhlaba nomhlobiso wayo futhi noma ngabe yini ekuMvelinqangi ingcono futhi ngasosonke isikhathi ikhona, ngakube aninamqondo yini na
Ngakube lowo esamethembisa isethembiso esihle yena uzohlangana naso njengalowo esamupha injabulo yempilo yalomhlaba besekuthi yena ngosuku lokuvuka kwabafileyo abengomunye walabo abayokujeziswa
Futhi ngosuku ayobabiza ngalo athi, “baphi abahlanganyeli bami labo enaningenzela bona na?”
Labo izwi elafinyelela kubona liyiqiniso bayothi, “Nkosi yethu naba laba esabaphambukisa, sabaphambukisa njengoba saphambuka uqobo lwethu siveza ukubamsulwa kwethu kuwena akuyithina ababesikhonza”
Futhi kuyothiwa, “bizani abahlanganyeli benu ngakho-ke bayobamemeza kepha angeke babaphendule futhi bayosibona isijeziso, ukube nje babeholeleke (endleleni eqondile)”
Futhi ngosuku ayobabiza ngalo bese ethi, “naziphendula kanjani izithunywa na?”
Ngakho-ke izindaba ziyofiphala kubona ngalolosuku angeke bakwazi ukubuzana bodwa
Kepha lowo ophendukayo azisole futhi akholwe enze izenzo ezinhle ezilungileyo uyokuba ngomunye wabaphumeleleyo

Futhi iNkosi yakho idala noma ngabe yini eyithandayo futhi iyakhetha, akusikona okwabo ukukhetha udumo malube kuMvelinqangi futhi uphakeme ngaphezu kwako konke lokho abamenzela ngako abahlanganyeli ekumkhonzeni
Futhi iNkosi yakho iyakwazi lokho izifuba zabo ezikufihlayo nalokho ezikuvezayo
Futhi yona inguMvelinqangi akukho okunokukhonzwa ngaphandle kwayo udumo lungolwayo ngokokuqala nangokokugcina futhi ukwehlulela kungokwayo futhi niyophindiselwa kuyona

Ithi ngakube nibonile yini ukuthi uma uMvelinqangi wayenganenzela ubusuku buqhubeke kuze kube usuku lokuvuka kwabafileyo yimuphi uNkulunkulu ngaphandle kukaMvelinqangi onganilethela ukukhanya na? Ngakube anizwa yini na

Ithi ngakube nibonile yini ukuthi uMvelinqangi wayenganenzela imini iqhubeke kuze kube usuku lokuvuka kwabafileyo yimuphi uNkulunkulu ngaphandle kukaMvelinqangi onganilethela ubusuku eniphumula kubona na? Ngakube aniboni yini na
Futhi kusemseni wakhe ukuthi wanenzela ubusuku nemini ukuze niphumule kubona nokuthi nifune umusa wakhe nokuthi nibonge
Nangosuku lapho eyobe ebabiza bese ethi, “baphi abahlanganyeli bami labo enanibenza na”
Futhi siyokhipha ufakazi kuzona zonke izizwe bese sithi, “lethani ubufakazi benu ngakho-ke bayokwazi ukuthi iqiniso ngelikaMvelinqangi futhi kuyobalahlekela konke lokho ababekuqamba”

Ngempela uQarun wayengomunye wabantu bakaMose kepha wabahlupha futhi samupha emnothweni izikhiye zawo zingaba ngumthwalo wamadoda aqatha, khumbula ngenkathi abantu bakhe bethi kuyena “ungesasi ngempela uMvelinqangi akabathandi abesasayo

Kepha funa indawo yokuhlala yempilo ezayo ngalokho uMvelinqangi akunika kona futhi ungayikhohlwa ingxenye yakho kulomhlaba wenze okuhle njengoba uMvelinqangi wenza okuhle kuwena futhi ungafuni ukwenza ukona emhlabeni, ngempela uMvelinqangi akazithandi izoni

Wathi, “kuphela nginikiwe lokhu ngenxa yolwazi enginalo, wayengazi yini ukuthi uMvelinqangi wazibhubhisa izizukulwane ngaphambilini kwakhe ezazinamandla kunaye futhi zaziziningi kakhulu ngenani futhi angeke zibuzwe izoni ngezono zazo
Ngakho-ke waphuma waya kubantu bakhe ewubukhazikhazi wathi, “labo abafisa impilo yalomhlaba, Oh! Sifisa sengathi singaba nako konke lokho okwanikwa uQarun ngempela yena unenhlanhla enkulu

Kepha labo ababenikezwe ulwazi bathi “usizi kunina! umvuzo kaMvelinqangi ungcono kunoma ngabe ngubana okholwayo futhi owenza izenzo ezinhle ezilungileyo abekho abemukeliswa lokho ngaphandle kwababekezelayo
Ngakho-ke sawenza umhlaba ukuthi umgwinye kanye nendlu yakhefuthiwayengenaloiqembuelalizomelekelelaukubhekana noMvelinqangi futhi wayengeke akwazi ukuzivikela

Futhi labo ababefisa isikhundla sakhe ngayizolo baqala bathi, “Oh ngempela! NguMvelinqangi owandisa isabelo kunoma ngabe ngubani amthandayo ezincekwini zakhe noma asinciphise (isabelo), ukube uMvelinqangi wayengenawo umusa kuthina wayezokwenza ukuthi umhlaba usigwinye, Oh labo abangakholwa! angeke baphunyeleliswe
Leyondawo yokuhlala yempilo ezayo siyoyibekela labo abangathandi ukuziphakamisa nokona emhlabeni futhi isiphetho (esihle) esalabo abenza okulungileyo

Noma ngabe ngubani oletha okuhle ngakho-ke okwakhe kuyoba okuhle kunako, futhi noma ngabe ngubani oletha izenzo ezimbi, ngakho-ke angeke abanike umvuzo labo abenza izenzo ezimbi ngaphandle kwalokho ababekwenza

Ngempela (u-Allah) lowo owenza iQur’an yaba yisibopho kuwena uzokwenza ukuthi uphindele endaweni yokuphindela ithi, “iNkosi yami yazi kabanzi ukuthi ngubani oletha ukuholwa nokuthi ngubani osekudukeni okucacile
Futhi wawungalindele ukuthi incwadi iyokwembulwa kuwena kepha kungumusa ovela eNkosini yakho, ngakhoke ungabi ngumelekeleli wabangakholwa
Futhi abangakuvimbeli emavesini ekushumayeleni ngezimpawu kaMvelinqangi emva kokuba esembuliwe kuwena, futhi memela eNkosini yakho futhi ungabi ngomunye wabakhonza izithombe

Futhi ungambizi omunye unkulunkulu kanye noMvelinqangi akekho onelungelo lokukhonzwa ngaphandle kwakhe, zonke izinto ziyobhubha ngaphandle kobuso bakhe kungokwakhe ukwehlulela futhi niyophindiselwa kuyena
ALIF LAM MEEM
Ngakube abantu bacabanga ukuthi bayekwe bathi, “siyakholwa futhi bona angeke balingwe yini?”
Futhi ngempela sabalinga labo ababengaphambilini kwabo ngakho-ke uMvelinqangi uyabazi labo abaneqiniso futhi uyabazi abaqamba amanga
Noma labo abenza izenzo ezimbi bacabanga ukuthi bangasidlula na? okubi yilokho abakwehlulelayo
NomangabengubaniowethembaukuhlangananoMvelinqangi ngakho-ke ngempela isikhathi sikaMvelinqangi siyeza futhi yena ungozwayo owaziyo
Futhi noma ngabe ngubani ozabalazayo kuphela uzabalazela umphefumulo wakhe ngempela uMvelinqangi akadingi lutho emhlabeni
Futhi labo abakholwayo benze imisebenzi elungileyo ngempela siyobasula ububi babo bese sibanika umvuzo omuhle kakhulu kwaloko ababekwenza

Futhi siyale umntu ukuthi enze okuhle kubazali bakhe kepha uma bezabalaza ukukwenza ukuthi ungenzele abahlanganyeli ekungikhonzeni lokho ongenalo ulwazi ngako ungabahloniphi bobabili kukumina ukuphindela kwenu bese nginitshela ngalokho enanikwenza
Futhi labo abakholwayo bese benza izenzo ezilungileyo ngempela siyobangenisa phakathi kwabalungileyo

Futhi phakathi kwabantu kunalabo abathi, “siyakholwa kuMvelinqangi” kepha uma behlushwa ngenxa kaMvelinqangi bathatha ukulingwa kwabantu njengesijeziso sikaMvelinqangi uma sekufika usizo oluvela eNkosini yakho bathi, “ngempela thina sasikanye nani” akusiyena yini uMvelinqangi owazi kangcono ngalokho okusezifubeni zemihlaba (zabantu namajinn) na
Futhi ngempela uMvelinqangi uyabazi labo abakholwayo futhi ngempela uyabazi abazenzisi (emva kokubalinga)
Futhi labo abangakholwa bathi kulabo abakholwayo “landelani indlela yethu ukuze sithwale izono zenu kulapho bona bengeke bathwale lutho lwezono zabo ngempela bona baqamba amanga
Futhi ngempela bayoyithwala imithwalo yabo neminye imithwalo kanye nemithwalo yabo futhi ngempela bayobuzwa ngosuku lokuvuka kwabafileyo mayelana nalokho ababekuqamba
Futhi ngampela samthumela uNowa ebantwini bakhe wayesehlala phakathi kwabo iminyaka eyinkulungwane ngaphandle kweminyaka engamashumi amahlanu ngakho-ke uzamcolo wabathatha kulapho bona beyizoni
Ngakho-ke samsindisa kanye nalabo ababesemkhunjini futhi sakwenza lokho kwaba yisifundo emihlabeni
No-Abraham khumbula ngenkathi ethi kubantu bakhe, “khonzani uMvelinqangi futhi nimesabe lokho kungcono kunina ukube benazi”

Kuphela nikhonza izithombe esikhundleni sikaMvelinqangi futhi niqamba amanga ngempela labo enibakhonzayo esikhundleni sikaMvelinqangi abanawo amandla okunika isabelo, ngakho-ke sifuneni kuMvelinqangi isabelo futhi mkhonzeni, futhi nimbonge niyophindiselwa kuyena
Futhi uma niwuphika (umyalezo) ngempela izizwe zawuphika ngaphambilini kwenu futhi awukho umsebenzi ophezu kwesithunywa ngaphandle kokudlulisela umyalezo ocacile
Aniboni yini ukuthi uMvelinqangi uyisungula kanjani indalo bese eyiveza kabusha ngempela lokho kulula kuMvelinqangi
Ithi, “hambani ezweni nibone ukuthi wayisungula kanjani indalo bese uMvelinqangi eveza indalo yempilo ezayo, ngempela uMvelinqangi unamandla okwenza zonke izinto
Ujezisa noma ngabe ngubani omthandayo futhi abenomusa kunoma ngabe ngubani omthandayo futhi niyophindiselwa kuyena
Futhi nina aniphunyukile lapha emhlabeni nasezulwini futhi ngaphandle kukaMvelinqangi aninaye omunye umvikeli nomsizi
Futhi labo abangakholelwa emavesini kaMvelinqangi nasekuhlanganeni naye labo-ke abanalo ithemba emseni wami futhi labo okwabo yisijeziso esibuhlungu
Ngakho-ke ayibangalutho impendulo yabantu bakhe ngaphandle kokuthi bathi “mbulaleni noma nimshise”, kepha uMvelinqangi wamsindisa emlilweni ngempela kulokho kunezimpawu ebantwini abakholwayo

Futhi wathi, “kuphela nizithathele izithombe esikhundleni sikaMvelinqangi ngenxa yobungane phakathi kwenu empilweni yalomhlaba besekuthi ngosuku lokuvula kwabafikeleyo abanye benu baphike abanye futhi abanye benu bayoqalekisa abanye futhi indawo yenu yokuhlala kuyoba ngumlilo futhi angeke nibe nabo abasizi”
Wakholwa kuye uLothi wayesethi, “ngempela mina ngizoba ngoshiya ikhaya lami ngiye eNkosini yami ngempela yona iphakeme ngamandla inobuhlakani”

Futhi (u-Abraham) samupha u-Isaka noJakobe futhi enzalweni yakhe sabeka ubuphrofethi kanye nencwadi futhi samnikeza umvuzo wakhe kulomhlaba futhi ngempela yena empilweni ezayo uyokuba ngomunye wabalungileyo
NoLothi khumbula ngenkathi ethi ebantwini bakhe, “ngempela nina nenza ukukhohlakala eningakaze nedlulwe ngisho noma umuntu oyedwa kukona emihlabeni

Ngakube nina niza emadodeni futhi niphazamisa emgaqweni (niphanga izihambi) futhi emhlanganweni wenu nenza izenzo ezimbi ngakho-ke yayingelutho impendulo yabantu bakhe ngaphandle kokuthi bathi “silethele isijeziso sikaMvelinqangi uma kungukuthi wena ungomunye wabaneqiniso
Wathi, “Nkosi yami ngelekelele ebantwini abayizoni”
Futhi kwathi lapho sezifika izithunywa zethu ku-Abraham nezindaba ezinhle zathi “ngempela thina sizobabhubhisa abantu baledolobha ngempela abantu balo babeyizoni”
Wathi, “ngempela kulona kunoLothi” zathi “thina sazi kangcono ukuthi ngubani okulona ngempela sizomsindisa kanye nomndeni wakhe ngaphandle konkosikazi wakhe wayengomunye wabasalela ngemumva”

Futhi kwathi lapho izithunywa zethu sezifika waba lusizi ngenxa yazo wahamba elusizi ngenxa yazo zathi “ungesabi futhi ungaphatheki kabi ngempela thina sizokusindisa kanye nomndeni wakho ngaphandle konkosikazi wakho ungomunye wabasalela ngemumva”
Ngempela thina siyokwehlisela phezu kwabantu balelidolobha isijeziso esivela ezulwini ngenxa yokuthi bebephula umthetho
Futhi ngempela salushiya kulona uphawu olucacile kubantu abaqondayo
NaseMidyanisathumelaumfowabo uShuaybwathi,“Oh bantu bami! khonzani uMvelinqangi nithembe (umvuzo) wosuku lokugcina futhi ningenzi ububi ezweni njengezikhohlakali”
Ngakho-ke bamphika basebethathwa ukuzamazama komhlaba basala bedindilizile ezindlini zabo
No-A’D noThamund (ukubuyiswa kwabo) kwacaca kunina ezindlini zabo futhi uSathane wayenza yabukeka imihle kubona	imisebenzi yabo wayesebavimbela endleleni (eqondile) kulapho bebhekile
NoQarun noFaro noHaman futhi ngempela uMose wafika kubona nezimpawu ezicacile kepha bazikhukhumeza emhlabeni futhi babengeke baphunyuke (esijezisweni)

Ngakho-ke ngamunye sambamba ngesono sakhe phakathi kwabo kunalabo esabathumelela ngesichotho futhi phakathi kwabo kunalabo abathathwa ngumsindo owesabekayo futhi phakathi kwabo kunalabo esabagwinyisa ngomhlabathi futhi phakathi kwabo kunalabo esabaminzisa futhi akusiyena uMvelinqangi owenza okungalungile kubona kepha imiphefumulo yabo eyenza okungalungile

Isibonelo salabo abathatha (onkulunkulu bamanga) njengabavikeli esikhundleni sikaMvelinqangi sifana nesicabucabu esakha indlu futhi ngempela ezindlini eziyizintengentenge kakhulu yindlu yesicabucabu ukube nje babazi
Ngempela uMvelinqangi wazi noma ngabe yini abayimemezayo esikhundleni sakhe futhi yena uphakekeme ngamandla unobuhlakani
Futhi lezo yizibonelo esizenzela abantu futhi akekho oziqondayo ngaphandle kwabafundile
UMvelinqangi wadala amazulu nomhlaba ngeqiniso, ngempela kulokho kunophawu kwabakholwayo

Funda lokho okwembulwa kuwena okusencwadini futhi wenze umthandazo, ngempela umthandazo wenqabela ezonweni nasezenzweni ezimbi futhi ngempela inkumbulo kaMvelinqangi yinkulu kakhulu, futhi uMvelinqangi uyakwazi lokho enikwenzayo

Futhi ningaphikisani nabantu bencwadi ngaphandle kwaleyo (ndlela) engcono kakhulu, ngaphandle kwalabo abenza okungalungile phakathi kwabo futhi yithini, “siyakholwa kulokho okwambulwa kuthina nokwambulwa kunina futhi uNkulunkulu wethu noNkulunkulu wenu munye futhi thina siyazithoba ngaphansi kwentando yakhe

Futhi sayembula kanjalo kuwena incwadi ngakho-ke labo esabanika incwadi bayakhokhelwa kuyona futhi phakathi kwalaba kunalabo abakholelwa kuyona, abekho abawaphikayo amavesi ethu ngaphandle kwabangakholwa
Futhi awuzange uyifunde enye incwadi ngaphambilini kwayo lencwadi noma uyibhale ngesandla sakho sokudla, kepha abaqambi bamanga basekungabazeni
Qhabo! Wona angamavesi acacile ezinhliziyweni zalabo abesekwa ngolwazi, futhi abekho abawaphikayo amavesi ethu ngaphandle kwabayizoni
Futhi bathi, “kungani zingahliselwanga phansi kuyena izimpawu ezivela eNkosini yakhe na?” ithi “kuphela izimpawu zikuMvelinqangi futhi kuphela mina ngingumxwayisi ogqamile”
Akwanele yini kubona ukuthi thina sembule kuwena incwadi abafundelwa yona, ngempela kulokho kunomusa nesikhumbuzo kubantu abakholwayo

Ithi, “Wanele uMvelinqangi ukuba ngufakazi phakathi kwami nani wazi noma ngabe yini esemazulwini nasemhlabeni futhi labo abakholelwa emangeni futhi abangakholelwa kuMvelinqangi labo – ke bona bangabalahlekelweyo
Futhi bayakucela ukuthi usheshisa isijeziso, Ukuba kwakungesingenxa yesikhathi esinqunyiwe sasiyofika kubona isijeziso, futhi sasiyofika kubona bengazelele ngokuphazima kweso kulapho bona bengaboni
Bayakucela ukuthi usheshise isijeziso futhi ngempela isihogo siyobazungeza abangakholwa
Ngosuku lapho isijeziso siyokubamboza siqhamuka ngaphezulu kwabo nangaphansi kwezinyawo zabo futhi uyothi”yizwani enanivamise ukukwenza
Oh zinceku zami! Ezikholwayo ngempela umhlaba wami ubanzi Ngakho-ke khonzani mina ngedwa
Yonke imiphefumulo iyozwa ukufa bese nibuyiselwa kuthina

Futhi labo abakholwayo futhi abenza imisebenzi elungileyo ngempela siyobanika izindawo zokuhlala ezulwini (esivandeni) okugeleza ngaphansi kwaso imifula bayohlala lapho phakathi ingunaphakade, umvuzo omuhle kakhulu wabasebenzayo
Labo ababekezelayo futhi abathembela eNkosini yabo
Futhi zingaki izidalwa ezingaziphethe izabelo zazo na? NguMvelinqangi ozipha isabelo kanye nani futhi yena ungozwayo owaziyo
Futhi ukuba ubuzobabuza ukuthi ngubani owadala amazulu nomhlaba futhi wabeka ilanga nenyanga na? Bayothi ngempela “nguMvelinqangi kwenzeka kanjani ukuthi bachezuke (endleleni eqondile) na?”
UMvelinqangi welulela isipho kunoma ngabe ngubani amthandayo ezincekwini zakhe futhi ambeke esimweni sobuphofu, ngempela uMvelinqangi uyisazi sazozonke izinto

Futhi uma ubabuza ukuthi ngubani owehlisela phansi amanzi (imvula) avela esibhakabhakeni bese evusa ngawo umhlaba emva kokufa kwawo na? ngempela bayothi, “nguMvelinqangi”yithi, “udumo malube kuMvelinqangi” kepha iningi labo alinawo umqondo
Futhi impilo yalomhlaba ayiyilutho ngaphandle kokuthi iyinjabulo nomdlalo, futhi ngempela ikhaya lempilo ezayo lingelempilo (yangunaphakade) ukube nje bebazi
Ngakho-ke uma sebegibela emkhujini babiza uMvelinqangi ngobuqotho inkolo ingeyakhe (kuphela) kepha kwathi lapho ebasindisa ebafikisa emhlabeni kwaba yilapho bona bemenzela abahlanganyeli ekumkhonzeni
Ukuze bangakubongi lokho esabapha kona futhi bazithokozise, kepha bayokwazi
Ababoni yini ukuthi sayenza indawo engcwele yaphepha kulapho bethathwa ngenkani abantu emaceleni abo ngakube bakholelwa enkohlakalweni bangakholelwa emseni ka Mvelinqangi na
Futhi ngubani ongenabulungiswa kakhulu kunalowo oqambela uMvelinqangi amanga noma ophika iqiniso kulapho selifikile kuyena na? Akusona yini isihogo indawo yokuhlala abangakholwayo na
Futhi labo abazabalaza kanzima (endleleni) yethu ngempela siyobaholela endleleni yethu futhi ngempela uMveleinqangi ukanye nabenzi bokuhle
ALIF LAM MEEM
AbaseRoma banqontshwa
Ezweni eliseduzane futhi bona emva kokuhlulwa kwabo bayonqoba
Eminyakeni emibalwa, isinqumo singesikaMvelingangi ngemuva nangaphambili futhi ngalolosuku amakholwa ayojabula
Ngenxa yosizo lukaMvelinqangi usiza noma ngabe ngubani amthandayo futhi yena uphakeme ngamandla unesihawu
Isethembiso sika Mvelinqangi, uMvelinqangi akasephuli isethembiso sakhe kepha iningi labantu alazi
Bazi okubonakalayo kwempilo yalomhlaba, futhi bona abayinakile impilo ezayo

Abacabangi yini uqobo lwabo ukuthi uMvelinqangi akawadalanga amazulu nomhlaba kanye nako konke okuphakathi kwako kokubili. Ngaphandle	kweqiniso nangokwesikhathi esimisiweyo na? futhi ngempela iningi labantu liyiziphiki ngokuhlangana neNkosi yabo

Abahambanga yini emhlabeni ukuze babone ukuthi sasinjani isiphethosalaboababengaphambilinikwabona?Babenamandla ngaphezu kwabo futhi babewulima umhlabathi futhi bahlala kuwona isikhathi eside ngokwedlulele kunokuhlala kwalaba, futhi zafika kubona izithunywa zabo nezimpawu ezicacile, ngakho-ke kwangungesiyena uMvelinqangi owenza okungalungile kubona kepha yimiphefumulo yabo eyenza okungalungile
Khona manjalo isiphetho salabo ababenza okubi sasisibi ngokuba babewaphika amavesi kaMvelinqangi futhi babewenza inhlekisa
UMvelinqangi usungula indalo bese eyiphinda bese nibuyiselwa kuyena
Futhi ngosuku ekuyofika ngalo ihora izoni ziyopheleliswa ngethemba
Futhi angeke babenabo abakhulumeli phakathi kwezithixo zabo futhi bayoziphika izithixo zabo
Futhi ngosuku ekuyofika ngalo ihora, ngalolosuku bayohlukaniswa
Ngakho-ke labo abakholwayo futhi abenza izenzo ezinhle ezilungileyo bayokuba sengadini yentokozo
Futhi labo abangakholwanga abaphika amavesi ethu kanye nokuhlangana kwempilo ezayo labo bayolethwa esijezisweni
Ngakho-ke udumo malube kuMvelinqangi ngenkathi ningena kusihlwa nangenkathi ningena ekuseni
Futhi udumo lungolwakho emazulwini nasemhlabeni nasebusuku nasemini
Uveza ophilayo kofileyo futhi uveza ofile kophilayo futhi uphilisa umhlaba emva kokufa kwawo futhi niyovezwa kanjalo
Futhi olunye lwezimpawu zakhe (uMvelinqangi) ukuthi wanidala ngothuli kwase kuthi uma nina seningabantu nahlakazeka

Futhi olunye lwezimpawu zakhe ukuthi wanidalela amakhosikazi phakathi kwenu ukuze niphumule kuwona futhi phakathi kwenu wabeka uthando nomusa, ngempela kulokho kunezimpawu (nezifundo) ebantwini abacabangayo
Futhi olunye lwezimpawu zakhe yindalo yamazulu nomhlaba nokwehlukahlukana kwezilimi zenu kanye nemibala yenu, ngempela kulokho kunezimpawu kwabafundile
Futhi olunye lwezimpawu zakhe ukulala kwenu ebusuku nasemini nokufuna kwenu ububele bakhe, ngempela kulokho kunezimpawu ebantwini abezwayo

Futhi oluye lwezimpawu zakhe ukuthi unikhombisa umbani wokwesaba nowokunika ithemba futhi wehlisela phansi amanzi (imvula) evela esibhakabhakeni bese ephilisa ngayo umhlaba emva kokufa kwawo, ngempela kulokho kunezimpawu ebantwini abanomqondo
Futhi olunye lwezimpawu zakhe wukuthi izulu nomhlaba kumile ngomyalelo wakhe kuyothi uma enibiza ubizo olulodwa emhlabeni bheka! Nina niyoza
Futhi ungowakhe noma ngabe ngubani osemazulwini nasemhlabeni bonke bayamhlonipha
Futhi nguyena osungula indalo bese eyiphinda, futhi lokho kulula kakhulu kuyena, futhi umfanekiso wakhe uphakeme kakhulu emazulwini nasemhlabeni futhi yena uphakeme ngamandla anobuhlakani

Wanenzela isibonele emiphefumulweni yenu. Ngakube ninabo yini kulabo abasezandleni zenu zangakwezokudla abahlanganyeli kulokhu esabela kona ngakho-ke nina niyalingana kukona niyabesaba njengoba nesabana nina uqobo lwenu, siwachaza kanjalo ngokucacile amavesi kubantu abanomqondo
Kepha labo abangalungile balandela izifiso zabo ngaphandle kolwazi, ngakho-ke ngubani ongahola lowo uMvelinqangi amshiye ekudukeni na? futhi angeke babenabo abelekeleli
Ngakho-ke bhekisa ubuso bakho enkolweni ngobuqotho, indalo kaMvelinqangi okuyiyona adalela abantu kuyona ayingashintshwa indalo kaMvelinqangi, leyo yinkolo eqondile kepha iningi labantu alazi
Wanidala ngendlela yokuthi njalo niphendukele kuye ngokuzisola, futhi nimesabe futhi nenze umthandazo futhi ningabi ngabanye balabo abenzela uMvelinqangi abahlanganyeli ekumkhonzeni
Owalabo abahlukanisa inkolo yabo babe ngamaqembu, iqembu neqembu lijabulela loko elinako

Futhi uma inhlupheko ibathinta abantu babiza iNkosi yabo bephendukela kuyona ngokuzisola besekuthi uma ibazwisa umusa wayo kubeyilapho iqembu phakathi kwabo lenzela iNkosi yalo abahlanganyeli ekuyikhonzeni
Ukuze bangabongi ngalokho esabapha kona, ngakho-ke zithokoziseni (okwesikhashana) kepha nizokwazi
Noma ngabe selehlisela phansi kubona igunya (incwadi) ekhuluma ngalokho ababenzela ngakho uMvelinqangi abahlanganyeli na
Futhi kwathi lapho sesibazwisa abantu umusa bawuthokozela futhi uma behlelwa okubi ngenxa yalokho okulethwe ngaphambili yizandla zabo bheka! baphelelwa yithemba
Ababoni yini ukuthi uMvelinqangi isabelo uselulela noma ngabe ngubani amthandayo futhi asinciphise (kunoma ngabe ngubani amthandayo) ngempela kulokho kunezimpawu ebantwini abakholwayo
Ngakho-ke nikeza isihlobo okusifanele noswele kanye nesihambilokhokuhlekulaboabafunaubusobukaMvelinqangi futhi bayilabo abayophumelela

Futhi noma ngabe yini eniphisana ngayo njengesipho ukuze kwandeengcebweniyabantungakho-keayandikuMvelinqangi futhi noma ngabe yini eniyinikelayo njengeZakaah (ingxenye yengcebo ekhokhwa kwabampofu) nifisa ubuso bukaMvelinqangi, ngakho-ke labo bayophindaphindelwa kaningi

Umvelinqangi nguyena owanidala wayeseninika isabelo futhi uyokwenza ukuthi nife bese eniphilisa, ngakube ukhona yini phakathi kwabahlanganyeli (izithombeni) zenu ongenza okuthize okufana nalokhu na? Udumo malube kuye futhi uphakeme ngaphezu kwalokho abakuhlanganisa naye
Ububi bavela ezweni nasolwandle ngenxa yalokho okwavunwa yizandla zabantu, ukuze abenze ukuthi bezwe ingxenye yalokho ababekwenza ukuze babuye
Yithi, “hambani ezweni bese niyabona ukuthi sasinjani isiphethosalaboababengaphambilini, iningilabolaliyizikhonzi zezithombe”
Ngakho-ke bhekisa ubuso bakho enkolweni eqondile ngaphambi kokuba kufike usuku oluvela kuMvelinqangi akekho ongalugwema, ngalolosuku bayohlukaniswa
Noma ngabe ngubani ongakholwa uyohlukumezeka ngokungakholwa kwakhe futhi noma ngabe ngubani owenza imisebenzi emihle elungileyo ngakho-ke balungiselela imiphefumulo yabo indawo enhle
Ukuze abanike umvuzo emseni wakhe labo abakholwayo futhi abenza izenzo ezinhle ezilungeleyo, ngempela yena akabathandi abangakholwa
Futhi olunye lwezimpawu zakhe ukuthi uthumela imimoya ithwele izindaba ezinhle futhi anizwise emseni wakhe nokuthi imikhumbi ihambe ngemponqo yakhe nokuthi nifune umusa wakhe ukuze nibe nokubonga

Futhi ngempela sazithumela ngaphambilini kwakho izithunywa ebantwini bazo zafika kubona neziqinisekiso ezicacile sabe sesiyaziphindisela kulabo abayizoni futhi kufanelekile kuthina ukulekelela abakholwayo

UMvelinqangi nguyena othumela imimoya ukuze iphakamise amafu bese ewandlala esibhakabhakeni ngokuthanda kwakhe futhi uwenza izicucu bese ubona imvula iphuma phakathi kwawo, ngakho-ke uma eseyehlisele phezu kwalowo amthandayo ezincekwini zakhe bheka! zona ziyajabula
Futhi ngaphambi kokuba yehliselwe phezu kwabo ngaphambilini kwayo ngempela babephelelwe yithemba
Ngakho-ke bheka izimpawu zomusa kaMvelinqangi ukuthi uwuvusa kanjani umhlaba emva kokufa kwawo, ngempela lowo uyokuba ngumvusi wabafileyo futhi yena unamandla ngaphezu kwezinto zonke
Futhi uma sithumela umoya bese bewubona uphuzi ngempela bazoduka emva kwalokho bangakholwa
Ngakho-ke ngempela wena awukwazi ukwenza abafile bezwe futhi awukwazi ukwenza izithuli zizwe ukumenyezwa kulapho ziphenduka zibheka emuva
Futhi wena awusiyena umholi wezimpumputhe ekudukeni kwazo, awenzi ukuthi bezwe ngaphandlle kwalabo abakholelwa amavesini ethu kulapho bona bezithobile ngaphansi kwentando kaMvelinqangi

NguMvelinqangi owanidala (esimweni) sobuntekenteke emuva kobuntekenteke wenza amandla emva kwamandla wayesenza ubuntekenteke nezinwele ezimpunga. Udala noma ngabe yini ayithandayo futhi yena uyisazi ungusomandla
Futhi ngosuku ekuyofika ngalo ihora izoni ziyofunga ukuthi azihlalanga ngaphandle kwesikhathi esiyihora. Kanjalo zididisiwe ngasosonke isikhathi
Futhi labo abanikwa ulwazi nokholo bayothi, “ngempela nahlala ngokunqunywe nguMvelinqangi kuze kube usuku lokuvuka kwabafileyo ngakho-ke yilo lolusuku lokuvuka kwabafileyo, kepha nina naningazi
Ngakho-ke ngalolosuku labo ababeyizoni izaba labo angeke lisize ngalutho angeke banikwe ithuba (lokwenza okulungileyo)
Futhi ngempela sabenzela abantu zonke izibonelo kuleQur’an futhi uma ubalethela uphawu noma isiqiniseko ngempela labo abangakholwanga bangathi “nina aniyilutho ngaphandle kwabalandeli benkohliso”
Ngakho ke uzivala kanjalo uMvelinqangi izinhliziyo zalabo abangazi
Ngakho-ke bekezela ngempela isethembiso sikaMvelinqangi siyiqiniso futhi abangakudumazi inhliziyo labo abangenako ukuqiniseka enkolweni
ALIF LAM MEEM
Lawa ngamavesi encwadi enobuhlakani
Ukuholwa nomusa kwabenzi bokuhle
Labo abenza umthandazo futhi abakhokha izakaah (ingxenye yengcebo ekhokhwa kwabampofu) futhi bona baqinisekile ngokukholelwa empilweni ezayo
Labo-ke basekuholweni okuvela eNkosini yabo futhi labo bangabaphumeleleyo
Futhi phakathi kwabantu kunalowo othenga inkulumo eyize ukuze adukise (ngayo abantu) endleleni kaMvelinqangi ngaphandle kolwazi futhi ayenze inhlekisa, labo-ke okwabo yisijeziso esidumazayo
Futhi uma efundelwa amavesi ethu uyafulathela ngokuzigqaja kube sengathi angakwenza kube sengathi ezindlebeni zakhe zombili kunobuthuli ngakho-ke mtshele ngesijeziso esibuhlungu
Ngempela labo abakholwayo futhi abenza imisebenzi emihle okwabo yizivande zenjabulo
Bahlale khona ingunaphakade, isethembiso sikamvelinqangi siyiqiniso futhi yena uphakeme ngamandla unobuhlakani

Wadala amazulu angenazo izisekelo enizibonayo futhi wabeka izintaba emhlabeni hleze uzamazame nani futhi wasakaza kuwona zonke izihlobo zezilwane futhi sehlisela phansi amanzi avela esibhakabhakeni sabe sesikhulisa kuwona zonke izihlobo (zezithombo) ezingambili ezinhle
Lena yindalo kaMvelinqangi ngakho-ke ngikhombiseni ukuthi badalani labo ngaphandle (kwendalo) yakhe, qhabo izoni zisekudukeni okugqamile

Futhi ngempela samupha ubuhlakani uLuqman ukhuthi makabonge uMvelinqangi futhi noma ngabe ngubani obangayo kuphela ubongela umphefumulo wakhe futhi noma ngabe ngubani ongabongi ngakho-ke ngempela uMvelinqangi akadingi lutho ufanelwe ukudunyiswa

Futhi (khumbula) ngenkathi uLuqman ethi endodaneni yakhe ngenkathi eyeluleka “Oh ndodana yami! Ungamenzeli uMvelinqangi abahlanganyeli ekumkhonzeni ngempela ukwenzela uMvelinqangi abahlanganyeli ekumkhonzeni kungukona okukhulu ngempela”

Futhi samyala umuntu ukuthi enze okuhle kubona bobabili abazali bakhe, unina wayemkhulelwa ngobuthakathaka nangobunzima phezu kobuthakathaka nobunzima, ukukhumulwa kwakhe (ebeleni) kuseminyakeni emibili, bonga mina (Mvelinqangi) kanye nabazali bakho bobabili kukumina ukufinyelela kokugcina

Futhiumabezabalazakanyenaweukukwenzaukuthiungenzele abahlanganyeli ekungikhonzeni lokho ongenalo ulwazi ngako ngakho-ke bobabili ungabahloniphi futhi gcina ubudlelwano obumnene nabo bobabili kulomhlaba futhi landela indlela yalowo ozisolayo kumina ngakho-ke kukumina ukuphindela kwenu bese nginitshela ngalokhu ananikwenza
Oh ndodana yami! Noma ngabe yini engangesisindo sohlamvu lwemastad noma ngabe kusedwalweni noma kusemazulwini noma kusemhlabeni uMvelinqangi uyoza nako, ngempela uMvelinqangi umnene uyazi
Oh Ndodana yami! Yenza umthandazo futhi wenze okuhle okulungileyo wenqabele okubi futhi ubekezelele noma ngabe yini ekuvelelayo ngempela lokho ngeminye yemiyalezo (yezeluleko) ezibalulekile
Futhi ungabuphenduleli ubuso bakho kubantu ngokwedelela Futhi ungahambi ezweni ngokuqholosha ngempela uMvelinqangi akabathandi bonke abaqholoshayo abazidlayo
Futhi zithobe ekuhambeni kwakho futhi wehlise izwi lakho (uma ukhuluma) ngempela ukubhonga okubi kakhulu ukubhonga kwembongolo

Aniboni yini ukuthi uMvelinqangi wenza noma yini esemazulwini yanithobela nanoma yini esemhlabeni futhi waphelelisa umusa wakhe phezu kwenu ngokugqamile nangokufihlekile futhi phakathi kwabantu kunalowo owenza impikiswano ngoMvelinqangi Ngaphandle kolwazi noma ngokuholwa noma ngencwadi ekhanyayo
Futhi uma kuthiwa kubona landelani lokho okwembulwa nguMvelinqangi bathi qha silandela lokho esafica obaba bethu bekukona yize noma ngabe usathane ebamemela esijezisweni somlilo nizobalandela na
Futhi noma ngabe ngubani othobisa ubuso bakhe kuMvelinqangi futhi yena engumenzi wokuhle ngempela ubambelele esibambelelweni esiqinile futhi sikuMvelinqangi isiphetho sezindaba
Futhi noma ngabe ngubani ongakholwa akungakuphakathi kabi ukungakholwa kwakhe, kukuthina ukubuyela kwabo bese sibatshela ngalokho abebekwenza ngempela uMvelinqangi uyisazi salokho okusezifubeni
Sibathokozisa okwesikhashane bese sibaphoqelela esijezisweni esinzima
Futhi uma ubabuza ukuthi ngubani owadala amazulu nomhlaba? Ngempela bayothi “nguMvelinqangi” ithi udumo malube kuMvelinqangi kepha iningi labo alazi
IngelikaMvelinqangi noma ngabe yini esemazulwini nasemhlabeni ngempela uMvelinqangi akadingi lutho ufanelwe ukudunyiswa

Futhi ukube zonke izihlahla emhlabeni zazingamapeni, nolwandle nezinye izilwandle eziyisikhombisa ezenezeleliwe emva kwalo (njengoyinki wokubhala amazwi kaMvelinqangi) amazwi ka Mvelinqangi ayengeke aphelele. Ngempela uMvelinqangi uphakeme ngamandla unobuhlakani
Ukudalwa kwenu nokuvuswa kwenu kwabafileyo akuyilutho kepha kunjengomphefumulo owodwa, ngempela uMvelinqangi uyezwa uyabona

Awuboni yini ukuthi uMvelinqangi wenza ukuthi ubusuku bungene osukwini futhi wenza ukuthi usuku lungene ebusukwini futhi wenza ilanga nenyanga ngakunye kuhamba kuze kube yisikhathi esinqunyiwe nokuthi uMvelinqangi uyakwazi lokho enikwenzayo na
Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi uMvelinqangi uyiqiiso nokuthi konke lokho abakumemezayo esikhundleni sakhe kungamanga nokuthi yena uphakeme, mkhulu
Awuboni yini ukuthi imikhumbi ihamba olwandle ngomusa kaMvelinqangi ukuze anikhombise okunye kwezimpawu zakhe na? Ngempela kulokho kunezimpawu kubona bonke ababekezelayo, ababongayo

Futhi uma bembozwa yigagasi libanjengomthunzi bamemeza uMvelinqangi beqotho kuye ngokholo, kepha uma esebasindisile wababeka emhlabathini, ngakho-ke phakathi kwabo kunalabo abamaphakathi (abanqikazayo ukuthi iyiphi indlela ekufanele bayilandele) futhi abekho abawaphikayo amavesi ethu ngaphandle kwabo bonke abasalela ngemumva abangabongi

(Oh Bantu! Yesabani iNkosi yenu futhi nesabe usuku lapho engekho ubaba oyokwezuzela indodana yakhe futhi ayikho indodana eyokwezuzela uyise utho, ngempela isethembiso sikaMvelinqangi siyiqiniso ngakho-ke ningayivumeli impilo yalomhlaba inikhohlise futhi ningamvumeli umkhohlisi omkhulu usathane) anikhohlise ngoMvelinqangi

Ngempela uMvelinqangi unolwazi lwehora futhi wehlisela phansi imvula futhi uyakwazi lokho okusezizalweni futhi akekho noma munye owaziyo ukuthi uzotholani kusasa. Futhi akekho owaziyo ukuthi uyofela komuphi umhlaba. Ngempela uMvelinqangi uyazi, welumukile
ALIF LAAM MEEM
Isambulo sencwadi ekungenakungabaza kuyo ivela eNkosini yemihlaba
Noma bathi wayiqamba qhabo! Yona iyiqiniso elivela eNkosini yakho ukuze uxwayise abantu ekungazange kufike kubona umxwayisi ngaphambilini kwakho, ukuze baholeleke (endleleni eqondile)

UMvelinqangi nguyena owadala amazulu nomhlaba kanye nako konke okuphakathi kwako kokubili ngezinsuku eziyisithupha wayesezibeka esihlalweni sobukhosi, aninaye omunye umvikela nomncengeli ngaphandle kwakhe anikhumbuli yini na
Uhlela udaba kusuka ezulwini kuya emhlabeni bese elukhuphukisela kuyena ngosuku, isilinganiso sako esiyiminyaka eyinkulungwane njengoba nibala
Leso yisazi sokungabonwayo kanye nokubonwayo esiphakeme ngamandla esinesihawu
Okunguyena owenza zazinhle kakhulu izinto azidalayo wayesesungula indalo yomuntu ngothuli
Wayesenza inzalo yakhe ngesidoda esiyamanzi anyanyekayo (akhululwa ngumuntu wesilisa nowesifazane uma besesimweni sokuhlangana)
Wayesemenza ngendlela efanelekile waphefumulela kuyena ngomphefumulo wakhe futhi wanenzela ukuzwa (amadlebe) nokubona (amehlo) nezinhliziyo kuncane lokho enikubongayo
Futhi bathi, “Uma sesidukile emhlabeni ngakube siyoba yindalo entsha yini na?” kepha bona bayakuphika ukuhlangana neNkosi yabo
Ithi, “izokwenza ukuthi nife ingelosi yokufa okuyiyona ebekelwe ukuthi inigade bese nibuyiselwa eNkosini yenu”

Futhi uma ungazibona izoni zigobise amakhanda azo ngaphambili kweNkosi yazo (zithi), “Nkosi yethu sibonile futhi sizwile ngakho-ke siphindisele emumva sizokwenza imisebenzi emihle elungileyo ngempela singamakholwa ngokuqinisekileyo
Ukuba sasithanda sasizonikeza yonke imiphefumulo ukuholwa kwayo kepha izwi eliyiqiniso livela kuthina ukuthi siyogcwalisa isihogo ngamaJinn kanye nabantu ndawonye
Ngakho-keyizwaningenxayokuthinakukhohlwaukuhlangana ngalolusuku lwenu ngempela (nathi) sinikhohliwe futhi yizwani isijeziso esingapheliyo ngenxa yalokho enanikwenza
Kuphela abakholelwa emavesini ethu yilapho okuthi uma bekhunjuziswa ngawo bawe phansi bazithobe futhi badumise ukuphakama kweNkosi yabo kulapho bona bengazigabisi
Izinhlangothi zabo zishiya imibhede (yabo) bememeza iNkosi yabo ngokwesaba nangethemba futhi basebenzisa (banikela) kulokhu esibabele kona
Ngakho-ke awukho umphefumulo owaziyo ukuthi yini eyifihlelwe bona engumvuzo othokozisa ihlo ngenxa yalokho ababekwenza
Ngakube lowo oyikholwa uyefana yini nalowo oyisaphulamthetho na? Cha abalingani
Futhi labo abakholwayo futhi abenza izenzo ezinhle ezilungileyo okwabo yizivande zokuhlala njengenjabulo ngenxa yalokho ababekwenza

Futhi labo abephula umthetho indawo yabo yokuhlala kuyoba ngumlilo. Ngasosonke isikhathi uma befisa ukuphuma kuwona bayophindiselwa phakathi kuwona futhi kuyothiwa kubona yizwani isijeziso somlilo okuyisona nina enanisiphika
Futhi ngempela siyobazwisa isijeziso esincane ngaphambi kwesijeziso esikhulu ukuze (bayeke ukona)
Futhi ngubani ongalungile kakhulu kunalowo okhunjuziswa ngamavesi eNkosi yakhe bese eyawafulathela ngempela siyoziphindisela kwabayizoni
Futhi ngempela samnikeza uMose incwadi ngakho-ke ningabi sekungabazeni ekuhlanganeni nayo futhi sayenza yaba ukuhola kubantwana bakwa Israyeli
Futhi sabeka abaholi phakathi kwabo abahola ngempoqo yethu kulapho bebekezela futhi babeqinisekile ngamavesi ethu
Ngempela iNkosi yakho iyokwehlulela phakathi kwabo ngosuku lokuvuka kwabafileyo ngalokho ababephikisana kukona
Akusikona yini ukuholwa kubona ukuthi zingaki izizukulwane esazibhubhisa ngaphambilini kwabo abahamba ezindlini zazo, ngempela kulokho kunezimpawu, ngakube abezwa yini na
Ababoniyiniukuthisathumelaamanziemhlabeniongugwadile sabe sesiveza ngawo izitshalo ezidliwa yimfuyo yabo kanye nabo, ngakube ababoni yini na
Futhi bathi “luyofika nini usuku lokwahlulela uma kungukuthi nina niqinisile na
Ithi, “usuku lokwahlulela angeke lube lusizo kulabo abangakholwa (noma ngabe) bekholwa futhi angeke banikwe ithuba”
Ngakho-ke qhelelana nabo bese uyalinda ngempela bona bangalindileyo
